title: Is We Dumb? | Remodel. Professional Listener. VHS. Door Handle.
description:
So tell me... if you can't pull a door open, why does it even have a handle in the first place?! As a species, we are better than this! Let's talk about that, peeing poop out your ween, going back to a client's house to destroy the shower you just built, a nice compliment from a coworker, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/EVhygse-LVU
